title: Ultimate Game Music Loops - Pop
description: 201 tracks - Inside find an extensive catalog of modern, pop, positive, music to choose from in many different energy levels in moods.
longDescription:
Check out the audio demos!


201 files included - The Ultimate Game Music Loops series was created for scaling game developers & producers looking for the best on-budget music loop & soundtrack library. Inside find an extensive catalog of modern, pop, positive, music to choose from in many different energy levels in moods. The music loop pack houses over 200+ tracks so you can rapidly create content, prototype, test as well as other useful use cases.Â All music is 100% royalty-free and can be used for all your music in your videos, social media posts, adverts, website, film, game, you name it!


Features:

130 music loops

71 full length sound tracks


Multiple Variations Of Each Loop

Most music tracks include full, loop & alt version loops like verse, chorus, bridge so you can truly mix & match how the tracks display. Having different sections of a song will help you control the amount of energy that is needed for a given level, scene, menu screen & more.


Best Budget Game Music Library

The music library is all organized into easy to understand folder structures & all files are labeled with keywords, descriptors, BPM & key tagged. This catalog features some awesome music perfect for content creators, video makers, game devs, & producers.
technicalDetails:
